snippet.title: Eniko: Ghosts Of Grace Announcement Trailer (Indie Action RPG)
snippet.description:
PLAY THE DEMO AND WISHLIST ON STEAM NOW: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1776820/Eniko_Ghosts_Of_Grace/ 

Eniko: Ghosts Of Grace is an action rpg indiegame developed by Halcyan Studio. Finally we can show the announcement trailer and share the Steam page!

----------------------------------------------------------------------
Credits
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Composer: Nickolas Wolfe - https://soundcloud.com/nickolas-wolfe-545971356
Game Developer: Kevin Verhoeven / Halcyan Games - https://eniko-game.com/
Art: Kato15s - https://www.instagram.com/kato15s/

---
Livia is on a quest to become a Champion of the Arena in this retro inspired 3D Action RPG. Explore the city of Belrynna and it’s long history and intricate traditions. Venture out in the surrounding woodlands, plains, mountains and caves to battle monsters and collect ingredients to increase your weapons, armor and stats. Will Livia be able to climb the ranks and become a champion of the Arena? After a faithful encounter, everything she believes in will be put to the test.

--- 
Follow the retro action indie rpg game Eniko: Ghosts Of Grace here:
Discord: Discord: https://discord.gg/JFvdsMvTPY
Itch.io: https://halcyan-studio.itch.io/eniko
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/enikogame/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/enikogame
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/enikogame
Ko-Fi: https://ko-fi.com/enikogame
Website: https://eniko-game.com/

---
